name: Dora Diginoid: Metroidvania game (made in Godot Engine)
name_original: Dora Diginoid: Metroidvania game (made in Godot Engine)
description:
Agent Dora Zero , is on a mission at base 17  , to destroy the Diginoid monsters and save the future of the earth !
Dora Diginoid is a sci-fi metroidvania game where you explore the base 17 , equip weapons , and eliminate the Diginoid monsters (animals turned into robots) .
Can you survive ? Can you save earth ?
